metadata.description: These Machines Are Winning presents: Slaves for Gods. This original graphic novel contains the first of four chapters of the story. Slaves for Gods is a post 9/11 conspiracy thriller that plays out like and 80's Sci-Fi adventure film. Taking place in modern day, it follows two computer programmers and an anarchist group, trying to bring down the evil corporation, Sen-Tec, and it's maniacal CEO. Additional interior art contributions by James O'barr (The Crow), Clayton Stillwell (The Book of Life), Antoine Dode (Percy Jackson, The Crow) and Sebastian Fiumara (Abe Sapien).
metadata.name: Slaves for Gods
